body.name: Tiumso Pet Hair Removal Broom, Rubber Broom with Squeegee for Carpet, 61 inch Adjustable Handle, Includes 2 Rubber Pet Hair Removal Brushes for Floor - Black and Red

features: Comfortable and Adjustable Pole: No More Bending! No Longer Loose! Tiumso fur remover broom offers an adjustable handle from 34" to 62" for people of different heights. With the Tiumso Upgrade Point-Lock Thread Pole, say goodbye to loosening! EVA foamed-grip rubber carpet broom provides a comfortable and non-slip grip. Get ready to fall in love with our soft EVA grip.

Efficient Carpet Guard: Tiumso beautifully crafted long silicone-bristled broom effortlessly navigates amid carpet fibers, effectively sweeping away finer dust particles often missed by vacuums. With pliant silicone, this rubber broom gently maintains wooden, tile and marble floors without causing scratches. Best of all, its soft bristles are gentle on pets' gums and teeth, even if accidentally bitten.

Chameleon-like Silicone Broom: This multi-functional pet hair remover broom effectively tackles pet hair while featuring a squeegee on its back for effortlessly removing floor stains and water stains on the wall. In addition, it comes with 2 cloth slots, allowing you to use microfiber cloths for instant mopping when needed.

Bonus Rubber Pet Hair Removal Brush: Grab the rubber broom for an additional 2 versatile handheld silicone brushes. Two silicone travel brushes are perfect for grooming the fur of pets and cleaning fur on furniture when dry, and for pets showering when wet. Gentle, dense bristles spotlessly clean the pet's skin while ensuring no irritation to them.

Pet-oriented Gift: This pet broom is easy to maintain. Rinse it gently with water and air-dry it. Natural rubber is easy to clean and requires little maintenance, so this rubber broom will last for many years! It is a must-have for pet stores and a perfect gift for pets-loving families.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy duty high quality work horse of a carpet dog hair remover......so to speak.
reviews.reviewText: Heavy duty high quality work horse of a carpet dog hair remover......so to speak. It is well made, with perfectly machined parts, so it's easy to assemble...... if there were any directions, I didn't see them, but I'll tell ya, I don't need no stinkin' directions... after all, I am man. Now, having said that, there's only one way to assemble this incorrectly, and that's exactly what I did, on my first try. I assembled the screw in pole sections, with the "thick hand grip cushion", down on the the "second" section, of the 4 section, pole. Upon realizing that was an oddly long way for me to be bending down to get a good grip, I deduced that the 2nd section, should indeed, be the "3rd" section, there by bringing the hand grip thing, up to a reasonable spot, for human use.... so a quick unscrew and a re-screw, reversing those two sections, and I was all set. I did it. I took on the task, with the initial "pole section" set back, unable to deter me, I plunged forward, analyzed the problem, applied my skills of logic, and viola, I had a correctly assembled, heavy duty, silicone brush, standing tall in front of me... knowing, at least this one time, I wouldn't be yelling for my wife to come help me. I was, at that moment, the king of my castle. Thank you. Thank you very much.And a nifty little pair of heavy duty silicone hand scraper tools too, what a deal. This is everything I hoped it would be. So gone are the days where I have to tell my wife every couple months, "look at this.. watch what happens when I scrape my tennis shoes across our rugs... look at all that hair bunching up, all of that doesn't get sucked up by our multi-hundred dollar vacuum cleaner!!". A problem, long ignored, year after year, is now ignored, no more. And you can take that to the bank. Over and out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This pet hair broom takes elbow grease to push but is effective
reviews.reviewText: The broom is easy to assemble and can be adjusted for length by removing sections. This was useful for me to use on my carpeted steps. I will say that it is a bit of a workout to push this through the carpeting due to the nature of the rubber having massive friction and being a sticky sort of silicone. That being aid I believe that is the science behind how it works so well. It pulls the pet hair that is embedded deep in the carpet fibers to the surface making it easier to vacuum. The included hand tools are a nice bonus. My daughter used on our furniture and I was surprised how much hair she was able to retrieve.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great product!
reviews.reviewText: Okay, first the negative. The two hand brushes can just be thrown away as far as I'm concerned. Yes, you can pull hair off with them. However, the hair isn't helf together and it's more of a mess to clean up than anything else.Now, on to the rake, I love, love, love i! Not only does it gather up the hair which I don't have nearly as much of as when I had Goldens, but it also gathers up anything else that you may have covering your carpets. Now most people probably don't have nearly as much "other" waste on their floors. However, with a bit over a Poochi like my little over a year pup (there's also a mix of Beagle, Terrier and Doxie to go with the Poodle and Chihuahua) there isn't a paper product, plastic bag and anything else she can destroy littering the floor. When I ordered this, I was hoping all would get gathered up. It does the trick.It's wider than my old carpet broom and clears an area fast and gathers up her hair and the cat's too. Very happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The broom works very well on my rug in the middle of our living room where the dogs hangout the most and shed on the most (besided the bedroom rugs). It also picks up the other little debris on the rug as well. The squeegee isn't something that I will probably ever use unless I use this out in our carport. The hand brushes seem flimsy and almost useless at first but then I found that the handle which also looks flimsy is not. It's very solid and flexible and the brushes work well on pulling the hair off our dogs without harming them. It's a helpful tool for our pets and a win win.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made broom
reviews.reviewText: Not sure what I expected when I ordered this rubber broom, but I got more than I expected. This rubber broom is well made. The handle and the rubber broom are not flimsy. When putting together the broom handle, you slide it together and then it screws into the other part of the handle. I have never seen this when purchasing other products like this. The rubber broom picked up pet hair from my floors and rugs easily. They also included 2 hand rubber brushes for furniture and you can put one in your car. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I use these for everything!
reviews.reviewText: If you asked me the one product I couldn’t live with out, it would be one of these guys. I use them for just about everything and I am not even kidding. Of course, they work on carpet really well, and are great at getting pet hair off of upholstery. But believe me when I tell you the possibilities are endless.This one is decent quality, but I would be cautious about going too hard with it. The rubber squeegee part does twist off easier than I would like but all in all it’s a solid 4 stars. The handheld tools are sweet too!I got this today and used it to scrub my walkway and porch, and it did the job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for My Needs
reviews.reviewText: I have rugs, laminate, and tile floors. Nothing I ever tried worked great on all of them, until now. And at least for the pet hair, this broom does the trick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pet hair cleanup
reviews.reviewText: The pet hair removal broom with a rubber squeegee has been a lifesaver in my home. The 61-inch adjustable handle makes it convenient to reach even the trickiest spots. The rubber broom efficiently tackles pet hair on carpets, and the added squeegee is a bonus for handling spills. The package included two rubber pet hair removal brushes, offering versatility for different floor types, furniture and bedding. The effectiveness of this broom in picking up pet hair is truly remarkable, making it an essential tool for pet owners. It's practical, adjustable, and a must-have for maintaining a clean home with pets. Highly recommended!
